item.title: Full Stack Simple Budget WebApp with Next.js 15
item.description: This project is a simple budget application developed with Next.js 15 (TypeScript). It allows to track expenses and manage budgets.

item.title: Vector Boson Scattering
item.description: My Ph.D. research project to search for vector boson scattering, a rare elementary physics process.
